Author: noonelovesacowgirl
Text: OP, this is totally correct. most of those calories are going to organs like your heart, brain, intestines, everything that needs to be rebuilt so they can function properly and keep you alive.  and the cravings *will* go away eventually, it's guaranteed, as long as you actually keep up with recovery and your body has repaired itself.

Author: cinnamonbicycle
Text: Hey, it's gonna be okay. My BMI was the same before I went into treatment, and girl lemme tell you I had to eat a HELL of a lot of food to gain anything at all. I was \*losing\* weight on what would otherwise be considered a weight-gain diet.  Your body is crippled from starvation. Your bones, your organs, your muscles, all of those are damaged and will use the calories for repair. And they \*reeeeally\* want those calories, man. You probably have gained weight, but this repair phase can't last forever and the extreme hunger should subside. I know this probably wasn't that helpful, just hang in there <3
